headline: Release (YC W20) is hiring a fullstack engineer to free teams from 'Cloudhell'
description:
We are looking for a fullstack engineer with ruby (preferably rails) experience and a desire to make developers lives easier and more productive.

See the job description here: https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/release/jobs/Co0LgYqSQ...

Environments for all! Come work with us to release teams from long wait times when configuration changes or you need to add a new service, etc.

Environments are key to software development at almost any scale. From new startups to large enterprises, environments are necessary and very difficult for companies of any scale to create and manage. Everyone needs to move fast and having to wait for devops or your SRE team anytime you need a new environment or an environment with different configuration is not compatible with Agile software orgs.

Release is a platform that is cloud agnostic with the ease of Heroku and all the power of cloud provider/s. Stop futzing with devops and get back to doing what you do best!

About Release Release is the simplest way to spin up even the most complicated environments. We specialize in taking your complicated application and data and making reproducible environments on-demand. We have raised over $20M from the best VC firms including CRV and Sequoia.

headline_zh-Hant: 發佈會（YC W20）正在招聘一名全棧工程師，將團隊從 "Cloudhell "中解放出來
description_zh-Hans:
We are looking for a fullstack engineer with ruby (preferably rails) experience and a desire to make developers lives easier and more productive.

See the job description here: https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/release/jobs/Co0LgYqSQ...

适合所有人的环境! 当配置发生变化或您需要添加新的服务等时，请与我们合作，让团队摆脱漫长的等待时间。

环境是几乎所有规模的软件开发的关键。 从新的初创公司到大型企业，环境是必要的，而且任何规模的公司都很难创建和管理。 每个人都需要快速行动，而当你需要一个新的环境或具有不同配置的环境时，必须等待devops或你的SRE团队，这与敏捷软件公司是不相容的。

Release是一个与云无关的平台，具有Heroku的易用性和云提供商的所有功能。 不要再纠结于开发，而是回到你最擅长的事情上来！

关于Release Release是启动最复杂环境的最简单方法。我们专注于为您提供复杂的应用程序和数据，并按需提供可重复的环境。 我们已经从最好的风险投资公司（包括CRV和红杉）那里筹集了超过2000万美元的资金。
